thread.section_title: Travelup Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.travelup.co.uk | 32 of 1272
thread.title: Laura S

author: Laura S
title: Laura S
text: Booked my honeymoon flights one evening, the following morning they called me up and very rudely told me the booking had been cancelled - giving no further reasoning and have refunded my money (which will take three working days, meaning I cannot even book replacement flights). Customer service is absolutely appauling, the representative that rang me was beyond rude and couldn't hang up quick enough. AVOID AT ALL COSTS!!
